## PointValues.removeField() method

Removes a field with the specified name if it exists; otherwise, it does nothing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeField(name: string): PointValues;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the field to be removed. |

**Returns:**

[PointValues](./influxdb3-client.pointvalues.md)
